info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 6:54PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Macon, south central Swain and eastern Graham Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 654 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Robbinsville, or 6 miles southeast of Fontana Lake, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fontana Lake, Wesser, Stecoah, Burningtown, Kyle, Nantahala, Wayah Bald, Cheoah, Luada and Almond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
